title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the informal power being used by the president.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the use of that power can influence the legislative process.

For Task B, the response must explain how the partisan control of Congress described in this scenario impacted the passage of the First Step Act.

For Task C1, the response must describe another part of the executive branch, other than the president, that could affect this legislation after its passage.

For Task C2, the response must explain how that part of the executive branch might affect the success of The First Step Act after its passage.
